pages.text: While getting around the various plateaus, floating islands, and all the craziness of this world I discovered Grapple Hooks. I made a wooden hook and was given a stone hook as a reward! These hooks are awesome - I can hardly wait to upgrade this to the diamond level!

pages.title: Grapple Hooks
pages.text: I found the recipes for iron through diamond hooks are missing, so I have included them $(l:grapple_hook_recipes)here.
